description: Details of refuse and recycling storage pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: P/2011/4504 dated 08/02/2012 for construction single storey building to be used as restaurant/take away (use class A3/A5); reconfiguration of car parking area and omission of service access from Rockware Avenue (Alterations to planning permission ref. P/2009/3602 for Remodelling and extension to Westway Cross Retail Park; incorporating the Remodelling of the front elevations of the building, including replacement of the existing glazed canopies, partial demolition of Unit 8 and extension to unit 1 (No Net Increase), relocation of Class A3/A5 unit with enlargement by 47m2. construction of two ancillary class A1/A3 units totaling 270m2 and Construction of a new management unit  (adjacent to Green Park Way), upgrading of public realm, revised car parking circulation and car parking arrangements, additional service access from Rockware Avenue, Associated landscaping and improved provision for cycle parking, pedestrian access and disabled car parking)
